subTitle: GENERAL ELECTRICAL
body: Consumer unit upgrade • Complete rewires • Wiring for extensions and new-builds • CCTV installation • Security system installation and servicing • Electric underfloor heating (lifetime guarantee available) • Voltage optimisers (ideal to reduce energy consumption and costs) • Portable appliance testing (PAT) • Electical testing and inspections • Landlord checks and certification • Third party elctrical certification

subTitle: GENERAL MAINTENANCE
body: Lock repairs and replacement • Kitchen and bathroom modernisation • Shower installation • Sourcing and hanging doors • Intalling shelves

CAN'T FIND THE SERVICE YOU'RE LOOKING FOR? PLEASE GET IN TOUCH AND TELL US WHAT YOU NEED. IF WE CAN HELP, WE WILL. IF WE CAN'T, WE'LL TELL YOU UPFRONT AND MAY BE ABLE TO PUT YOU IN CONTACT WITH A LOCAL SUPPLIER WHO CAN
